name: HowHotHowLong
0:
”Alexa ask how hot how long for Chocolate Cake.”
”Alexa, ask how hot how long to create a new entry.”
”Alexa open how hot how long”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how hot how long
des:
Always forgetting how long to cook your Enchiladas? Can't remember the temperature for your chocolate chip cookies? Simply tell How Hot How Long the name, temperature, and duration and we'll remember it. Recall it by simply having Alexa 'ask How Hot How Long for Enchiladas' or 'ask How Hot How Long do chocolate chip cookies cook for?'

Easy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
